column4: When is the best time to find someone available to help here, does anyone know?
depends on where you are in the world i suppsoe
London
sorry I am in London
i'm in korea
ching chong wing wong
i'm not wizzard though
oh gosh OK so how many hours from now?  I can come back later when there are more people available to help
i think earlier today
like 6 hours ago i had alot of ppl tackling the questions i was asking
what are you trying to do anyways?
I think my file system is corrupt and ty for your help :)
what have you tried?
not very much as I don't know what I am doing
do you think it's the file system or that there are bad sectors on the drive?
i ran fsck from a terminal and got stuck there
could be a bad sector or superblock
you could look for a program called spinrite
you boot up from the disk
if it's a disk sector that can be recovered it will do it
I can only boot from live cd
you could mount it to a thumb drive and boot from there. i didn't realise you were in such dire straights
